description:
Layton reminds me so much of Bay and Kristopher. Dirty Boy vibe, lots of tatts, and just oozing raw sex energy.
Layton is 27 and has the calm confidence of someone who has tried all kinds of things. He identifies as straight, but it sounds like he has messed around with guys. I can't say for sure, but it sounded like there might have been a couple drunken buddy moments.
He does have a wide variety of friends, and seems to know a little something about everything under the sun. A great to have a conversation with.
Of course, you don't just want to talk with Layton. There is that hot body to pay attention to as well! He actually shaved-off his pubes days before this shoot. After I had spent weeks verifying, with photo evidence, that he had his pubes pretty much intact. Grrrrr!
Layton loves the camera, and his solo is definitely in the Elite category!
title: Layton - Solo
